articles.author: Lawrence Richard
articles.title: Cruz responds to Macron's 'stunning' decision to back China despite Biden's pandering: 'Assiduously courted’ - Fox News
articles.description: After France's Emmanuel Macron urged Europe not to follow the U.S. in supporting Taiwan, Sen. Ted Cruz scolded President Biden's leadership and foreign policy.
articles.content: Sen. Ted Cruz, R-Texas, took to Twitter early Wednesday morning to chastise President Biden and his foreign policy, which he claims led Americas oldest ally into the waiting arms of Chinas Xi Jinping… [+2701 chars]

articles.author: India Today Science Desk
articles.title: Juice mission to launch tomorrow: What will Europe's mission do around Jupiter? - India Today
articles.description: The Juice will launch from Europe's spaceport French Guiana on an eight-year-long voyage to Jupiter and its moons.
articles.content: By India Today Science Desk: The European Space Agency has fully integrated Ariane 5 for flight carrying its Juice mission beyond Earth. The JUpiter ICy Moons Explorer (Juice) mission will launch to … [+3332 chars]

articles.author: Tereza Pultarova
articles.title: Europe's Jupiter Icy Moons Explorer is unlikely to find life. Here's why. - Space.com
articles.description: "We don't expect traces of life on the surface of these moons and it's not feasible yet to go down to where there might be life."
articles.content: Even after Europe's Jupiter Icy Moon Explorer (JUICE) concludes its mission more than ten years from now, we are unlikely to know for sure whether life might be thriving in the vicinity of the solar … [+10213 chars]
